Given $\tan \theta \sec \theta = 1,$ find
\[\frac{1 + \sin \theta}{1 - \sin \theta} - \frac{1 - \sin \theta}{1 + \sin \theta}.\]
inference: Final Answer: $\boxed{4 \tan \theta \sec \theta}$. I hope it is correct.
